title: about permanetly banned
body: can i get my account back plz.i understand my fault.what can i do for get it back ?

replies.body:
You recognized your fault and you fully acknowledge what you've said and done.
So absolutely nothing. Don't do it on your next account.

absolutely nothing unfortunatley.
once your permanently banned, its the end of the road UNLESS that punishment was in error.

you are free to create another account if you would still like to enjoy the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Snapp2Kill,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wn2KW8zl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-01T03:18:22.287+0000)
>
> absolutely nothing unfortunatley.
> once your permanently banned, its the end of the road UNLESS that punishment was in error.
> 
> you are free to create another account if you would still like to enjoy the game.

this
you have to make a new account, get it to level 300 and do the haruhi dance.

It is called the Hare Hare Yukai.

As for the topic, it depends on why you were banned. If you did a chargeback I think you get unbanned once the amount due is paid, or if it is a safety ban then it will be unbanned once they determine that you are you through a support ticket.

If it is a toxicity ban that was not in error then nothing can be done.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wn2KW8zl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-12-01T04:16:53.979+0000)
>
> It is called the Hare Hare Yukai.
> 
> As for the topic, it depends on why you were banned. If you did a chargeback I think you get unbanned once the amount due is paid, or if it is a safety ban then it will be unbanned once they determine that you are you through a support ticket.
> 
> If it is a toxicity ban that was not in error then nothing can be done.

I know what its called but hare hare yukai has more letters than haruhi dance.
they dont need my account just gimme it back.
You said yourself that you understood it is your fault. You broke the rules, know it and admitted to it... Your account is gone. You may start over but, a punishment is a punishment
